transcript:
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: Hello. Ha hi. Ha boliye na. Good afternoon. Humara bolne se pehle aap karne ka koshish kar rahi thi aapke pass aapka aawaz nahi aa raha tha. Aur meri se baat bhi nahi ho payi aapke. Ab to mere khayal se aawaz theek aa rahi hai. Humara bol rahi hu IndiaMART head office se senior manager.
Customer: Okay okay okay okay boliye.
Executive: Ha aapke account manager hai na Ishant unke liye aapne feedback diya tha whatsapp pe. Ha sir main keh rahi thi ki sir agar account manager se koi problem to nahi hai kuch issue to nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi koi problem nahi hai par mere ko aisa hai ki IndiaMART pe se koi profit nahi mil raha hai.
Executive: Profit nahi mil raha hai. Okay. Hai sir agar sir main service ke usage ki baat karti hu na jaise jis hisab se service ko use karna chahiye to usko aapko IndiaMART business ke liye thoda help karte hai. To aap ek cheez ko notice karna. Sir thoda sa aapka ye hai ki apna buylead ka consumption is mahine mein kam ho raha hai. Ye thi lastly. Theek hai April mai mein tab bhi thoda initially aisa raha hai ki service kam use hui hai. But thoda sa zyada use karenge to abhi call zyada aane lagi hai aapko. Har mahine 11 13 call aani hai kyuki zyada call aati hai unhi se aap baat karte ho aur baat karte ho to convert hoti hai. To isliye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Yahi main simple formula hai. Baki aap jab buylead le rahe ho to aap recently buylead lijiye. Thode se filters hai aap unpe kaam kijiye aur bade product ki agar deal kar rahe hain to filter laga ke dijiye. Janti hu ki aap shuru se kaam kar rahe hain isme kafi time ho gaya saat aath mahine ho gaye hain isme. Theek hai but sir shuru se isko thoda aur acche se istemal kiya jana chahiye tha us hisab se.
Customer: Madam indirectly bolo IndiaMART se na hai na inquiry jo aaya wo to aaya usme se ek customer deal nahi hua. But wo direct customer main deal kiya hu usme lagbhag lagbhag 50 se 60 customer deal ho gaya. Bataiye.
Executive: 50 se 60 customer ka deal ho gaya alag alag. Directly directly.
Executive: Directly. Accha okay. Matlab IndiaMART ke through calls bhi aaye hain aapko kafi 11 12 aaye hain pichle teen char mahino mein. To customer aapko call pe kya bolte hain kya puchte hain kya kehte hain ye batao.
Customer: Customer kya bolenge ji. Jaise ki itne inquiry aate hain wo bolte hain aise ha.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To mera brand ka inquiry aata hi nahi wo other brand ka aata hai convince karne ki koshish karta hu par hota hi nahi wo.
Executive: Accha ek to dekhiye India brand to promote nahi karti hai but ha aapka jo product hai wo itna chhote price ka nahi hai kyuki machine bhi aapki matlab aisi hai ki 27 27 lakh ki hai harvester hai na 12 125 lakh 135 lakh ki machines hai aisa nahi hai ki deal convert nahi hoti hai accha business hota hai isme agar aapki aaram se ek do machine bhi convert ho jati hai pure saal mein to bhi aaram se aapka paisa jo hai recover ho jayega aur business ka thoda rahega but ha isme ye hai sir ki brand promote kyuki nahi hota hai to aap theek kar rahe hain aap apne product ko pitch kar rahe hain aap apne product ke bare mein customer ko bata rahe hain. Par dekhiye jaise bhi aapka product chahiye hoga ya to wo inquiry karenge call karenge hai na call agar direct aa rahi hai kisi ko kuch chahiye hoga puchna hoga rate puchna hoga aapke bare mein aapke product ke bare mein to call karega to ab aapko call badh ke aane lagi hai sir pichle teen mahine se 13 call 11 call 11 call aise aa rahi hai abhi pehle aapko do ya teen call mahine ki aati thi ab 11 aur 13 call aane lag gaye hain thoda aap buylead aur use kariye to aur zyada call aayegi iska matlab ye hai zyada call aa rahi hai matlab zyada customer se aapki baat ho pa rahi hai jinko interest hai aapke product mein aur agar interest wale customer se baat hogi to deal bhi convert for sure hoti hai sir thoda follow up lagta hai but ho jati hai aur catalog bhi naya hai sir apna kyuki aap bhi dekhenge ki naya to nahi keh sakte kafi time ho gaya hai abhi aaj saat aath mahine ho gaye hain to yahi cheez same catalog pe bhi dikhti hai ki ye customer kitna purana hai ye supplier kitna purana hai rating ki cheez bhi dikhti hai ab rating bhi aapki dikhne lagi hai to deal convert hone mein aapko thodi help milegi sir kyuki jab bada product hota hai product ka price bada hota hai to customer ye dekhta hai supplier bharosemand hai ya nahi hai kitna paisa hum laga rahe hain na wo cheez dekhta hai aapka catalog abhi isi saal live hua hai jaise ek saal bhi nahi hua abhi aur dusri cheez ye hai ki ab rating aa gayi hai to thoda sa aapko aur help milegi abhi five rating hai do teen logo ne aapke Kileshwar hai Roshan hai Ved Narayan hai inhone aapko ratings wagera bhi diye hain ispe ticket pe aapke catalog pe to ye cheeze aapko thoda aur help karengi rest isme na sir aapke kuch specification aur price nahi dale hain main wo dalwa deti hu to thoda aur help mil jayegi aapko isme theek hai ticket open ho gaya tha main band kar de rahi hu sir abhi yahan se theek hai chaliye theek hai theek hai theek hai okay okay okay okay ha mail aayega aapke pass aap dekh lena and but satisfied not satisfied ka ha okay sir. Aur main aapko message kar
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting enough profit from IndiaMART.

- Inquiries received are not relevant to brand.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to use buyleads effectively.

- Executive mentioned benefits of new catalog and ratings.

- Agreed to add missing specifications and prices.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will add missing specifications and prices.

- Customer will receive a satisfaction survey via email.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, ratings, inquiries, profit
